title: Polyvocal Mathematics Education Design Based on Knowledge-Building Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and workplace problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: A course for working professionals focusing on enhancing mathematical problem-solving skills applicable to job tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex mathematical problems multidimensionally and propose solutions through collaborative knowledge building
Learners can operate peer feedback systems using digital collaboration tools in smartphone-based learning environments
Learners develop visualization methods for mathematical ideas and integrate diverse perspectives in inclusive dialogue environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
